title: Royal Orchid has strong case in SAT against Sebi allegations: Chairman Chander K Baljee
description: "We went to the SAT. It has given a stay in the matter. The matter still has to be heard in detail," Chander K Baljee told ET. "The stay is there for some more time, but I feel that we have a strong case," he added, without elaborating further. Meanwhile, Regenta & Royal Orchid Hotels that primarily operates 5-star and 4-star hotels and resorts is aiming to cross the 100-hotels mark by September, with new properties coming up in Sakleshpur, Kolhapur, Gangtok and Nellore.
